reviews.review_msg: Lauren is not really my favourite professor. She likes you if you participate though. She generally just reads off the slides so you could skip class you just might miss some in class participation assignments. Get ready to memorize the entire book because the first midterm was 9 chapters.....

Lauren is not a bad professor, however she is just really boring as she reads off her slides.  I didn't enjoy her class because she made boring for me, made me lose interest in it. I didn't like her attitude...  So I ended up dropping the course, BEST DECISION EVER.

Cathy is by far the best professor I've had! She wants you to do well and goes out of her way to meet up outside of her office hours. Her tests are fair to what she teaches and she even gives you a forewarning as to some questions that will be on her exams. Definitely take a class with her if you can! You'll be missing out if you don't!
